text: No we did not have any plans as such for our future

I dropped out due to lack of money
		What plans can we make for our future?
keyword: What plans can we make for our future?

text: One should think of doing something good and different in agriculture
keyword: something good and different in agriculture

text: If they are educated then we can also better do the outside work like banks etc
One should do business
One can open a beauty salon; it fetched good returns
If they have more degrees then they will have an advantage when they go looking for jobs
We should study as much as we can so that we can take better care of our families
comments: assumed they mean take care of their families financially

text: If we are educated then we can stand on our own feet and take better care of our families
comments: assumed they mean take care of their families financially

text: All this is also true for boys. Boys have to get good jobs to be able to take care of their families
comments: assumed they mean take care of their families financially

text: Both boys and girls should get a good job once they complete their education
One should do something different than the traditional work
It is important to get a good job
My parents are not very educated and so I want that I should be allowed to study well and do something good with my life
keyword: do something good with my life

text: Both boys and girls should be allowed to work
Educated girls do jobs
I was also asked to drop out; I rarely go out of my house and that too only to get vegetables from my field
keyword: rarely go out of my house

text: It has been three years since I left studies; my parents made me discontinue because we did not have the money and also because they thought it was unsafe for me to go out alone to school

Girls help out their parents on their plot

text: Boys work in the agricultural fields
keyword: Boys work in the agricultural fields

comments: although no aspirations for boys were specified by female respondents, we assumed their aspirations are for paid jobs

text: There is no work for women here
Men do farming but what can women do?
Lot of girls stitch clothes and do some handicrafts
Some girls also work as farm labor to eke out a living
Boys also work as drivers
comments: although no aspirations for boys were specified by female respondents, we assumed their aspirations are for paid jobs

text: Boys do all kinds of labor work
keyword: Boys do all kinds of labor work

text: Men know more about agriculture than women
Girls know nothing about selling in the market
keyword: Girls know nothing about selling in the market

text: Girls will have to learn to drive the tractor; girls here don’t know biking then how can they drive a tractor
keyword: how can they [girls] drive a tractor

text: People think women know nothing about market practices and will get cheated
keyword: women know nothing about market practices

text: The society rules don’t allow women to go to the market
keyword: don’t allow women to go to the market

text: No women cannot go out alone
keyword: No women cannot go out alone

text: There are too many bad elements out there who can misbehave with them (3 respondents echoed this sentiment)
Some boys have no work but to pass lewd comments and ogle at girls and parents therefore naturally fear for the safety of their daughters
keyword: fear for the safety of their daughters

text: Some girls are also scared to go outside
Their “izzat” (reputation) is at stake; girls themselves don’t feel confident about going out alone
“ek ke saath ek free mil jati hai” i.e. boys think that they can feast their eyes on so many girls at the marketplace
keyword: boys think that they can feast their eyes

text:
It is very hard for a woman to sell in the market; It is difficult to even think about it
	She cannot go to the market but she can sell at individual homes and shops
comments: assuming this is due to mobility constraints

text: You will seldom find young single women roaming around freely in the market
They cannot for fear of miscreants
The outside world is so bad primarily because of the bad boys who don’t spare the girls
keyword: bad boys who don’t spare the girls

text: This is an absurd question because if parents don’t let their daughters go alone to the marketplace then how can they let them migrate?
keyword: how can they let them migrate?

text: Women don’t migrate
Parents start thinking differently once they marry their daughters; they think their girls are now the responsibility of their husbands
keyword: differently once they marry their daughters

text: No, I think they are not really right; married women can go out but only with their husbands
keyword: women can go out but only with their husbands

text: Yes, they [married women] have slightly more freedom but they can go out only with their husbands
keyword: go out only with their husbands

text: Parents who think well let their girls go out alone but they are few and far between
keyword: Parents who think well let their girls go out alone

text: People don’t say anything to married women
keyword: People don’t say anything to married women

text: Married women can roam around

Boys work on farms but not girls
Boys mostly learn all farm activities and are able to do everything
Boys can do all agricultural activities from ploughing to harvesting
Boys even work with machine
keyword: Boys work on farms but not girls

text: Women do not use machines
it is rare for women to be seen working in the fields here; only poor women do out of compulsion but it is all manual work
keyword: rare for women to be seen working in the fields

text: Women don’t work much in the fields; even the young girls mostly do not go to work

text: Young men do all the work their fathers do; they know all the agricultural activities including the machine

text: There are some important facts we must keep in mind when we talk of what work men and women can do; for example women cannot drive a tractor, only men can

keyword: Women usually are involved in manual harvesting

text:
Men go daily 2-3 times to their fields

keyword: Men go daily 2-3 times to their fields

text:
My father goes to our plot daily 2-3 times and then also goes to work
	My uncles also go for field preparation
	My uncles go during field preparation and also harvesting
keyword: father goes to our plot daily 2-3 times

[He will not allow her to join]
	[Most probably he will not let her join]

Her husband will think that women should best stay at home

He will tell her to sit at home and he will go himself

She can never go anywhere without asking her parents

text:
Work is distributed in joint families

No, he will not ask for her help since she is already busy with her own work

Mark will be very happy for his wife
	She is his wife and so he will naturally be happy with her progress
	He will be glad that he had made the right decision in allowing her to work

Her parents will scold her bad
